Name: Jose Oscar
description:
Jose, 52 years old, lives with his wife and two children in the Huaquillas neighborhood, San Ignacio, Cajamarca, where he has worked from a young age growing organic coffee.

José sells his product in the Cenfrocafe cooperative, which exports to the fairtrade market.

José will use the loan to buy organic fertilizer and to pay workers to weed his coffee field.
